article_title: Heidi promises husband will abolish IRS
article_text:
Kokomo, IN (46901)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then cloudy skies this afternoon. High 84F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms during the evening. Cloudy skies after midnight. Low 68F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , cruz, irs, kokomo, policy, bush, howard county, perspective, obama
article_metadata.author: Devin Zimmerman

og.description: Heidi Cruz claims that if the American people elect Ted the next president of the United States, the Internal Revenue Service is out.
